title: PBE Account?
body:
Hello,

Recently I was invited onto the PBE cycle for NA so I created an account by the name (username = "Grrr" ingame = "Grr")

It's been almost 24 hours and my account is stuck as level 1 with 0 rp and 0 ip.

Any help?

replies.body: Welp, that's strange. I went ahead and pulled up your account, and it looks like everything has been added and you've been leveled up now. Enjoy your testing ^_^!

Perhaps I'm doing something wrong, but it still shows up like this to me:
https://gyazo.com/5516196f498819ea9fbab50ec2111f35

edit: I'm downloading the legacy version of the PBE client to see if that makes a difference.

I double checked your account and the points have been added, so I'm not entirely sure why they aren't showing up for you in the client. Sometimes you can go into the store and start to purchase an item, then back out before confirming the purchase, and that should refresh your point totals. If that doesn't work, go ahead and hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look.
I'm having the exact same issue, been about 24 hours now and still level 1 with 0 RP and IP. I tried to play a bot game to maybe trigger the script, but no dice. PBE IGN: Nixxay
